    • unWrapCoord

      public static haven.Coord unWrapCoord(Object obj)

    • include

      public static boolean include(String filename)
      Loads a script file into the current script environment.
      Parameters:
      String - filename - The name of the file without the extension. The file must have a .japi extension and reside in the "scripts" folder.
      Returns:
      A Boolean value. true if the include was successful, false otherwise.
      Since:
      7.1

    • jCoord

      public static haven.Coord jCoord(int x, int y)
      Returns a jCoord object representing the specified coordinates.
      Parameters:
      Integer - x - The x-coordinate.
      Integer - y - The y-coordinate.
      Returns:
      A jCoord object.

    • jGetInputWidget

      public static JSInputWidget jGetInputWidget(int x, int y, String header, String label)
      Creates an input window for entering text or numerical values.
      Parameters:
      Integer - x - The x-coordinate for the window's position on the screen.
      Integer - y - The y-coordinate for the window's position on the screen.
      String - header - The title of the window.
      String - label - The label text above the input field.
      Returns:
      A JSInputWidget object for user input.

    • jGetInputWidget

      public static JSInputWidget jGetInputWidget(haven.Coord pos, String header, String label)
      Overloaded method for creating an input window, using a jCoord position instead.
      Parameters:
      jCoord - pos - The coordinates for the window's position on the screen.
      String - header - The title of the window.
      String - label - The label text above the input field.
      Returns:
      A JSInputWidget object for user input.

    • jSelectChar

      String - name - The name of the character to select.
      Returns:
      A Boolean value. true if the character was successfully selected, false otherwise.

    • jHaveCharlist

      public static boolean jHaveCharlist()
      Checks if a character selection list is currently displayed on the screen.
      Returns:
      A Boolean value. true if the character selection list is present, false otherwise.

    • jHaveAggro

      public static boolean jHaveAggro()
      Checks if the character is currently under aggro.
      Returns:
      A Boolean value. true if the character is under aggro, false otherwise.

    • jGetBelief

      public static int jGetBelief(String name)
      Retrieves the belief counter value for a specified parameter. The belief window must be open.
      Parameters:
      String - name - The name of the belief. Acceptable values: life, night, civil, nature, martial, change.
      Returns:
      An Integer value of the belief value ranging from -5 to 5 if successful, or -255 in case of an error.

    • jBuyBelief

      public static boolean jBuyBelief(String name, int val)
      Moves the belief slider. The belief window must be open.
      Parameters:
      String - name - The name of the belief. Acceptable values: life, night, civil, nature, martial, change.
      Integer - val - The value to set, which must be -1 or 1.
      Returns:
      A Boolean value. true if the operation was successful, false otherwise.

    • jGetChats

      public static JSChat[] jGetChats()
      Retrieves a list of current open chats. For detailed operations with chats, refer to the corresponding documentation.
      Returns:
      A JSChat[] array representing the current open chats.

    • jSelectContextMenu

      public static void jSelectContextMenu(String name)
      Selects the specified option from the context menu.
      Parameters:
      String - name - The name of the menu option to select.

    • jSelectPopupMenu

      public static void jSelectPopupMenu(String name)
      Selects the specified option from the popup menu.
      Parameters:
      String - name - The name of the menu option to select.

    • jClosePopup

      public static void jClosePopup()
      Closes the context menu if it is open.

    • jSendAction

      public static void jSendAction(String name)
      Sends an action to the server.
      Parameters:
      String - name - The name of the action. Example: jSendAction("mine");

    • jSendDoubleAction

      public static void jSendDoubleAction(String name, String name2)
      Sends an action to the server with two parameters.
      Parameters:
      String - name - The name of the first action.
      String - name2 - The name of the second action. Example: jSendDoubleAction("craft", "axe");

    • jInGamePrint

      public static void jInGamePrint(String message)
      Outputs a message in-game (where messages like "This land is owned by someone" appear).
      Parameters:
      String - message - The text of the message to display.

    • jToggleInventory

      public static void jToggleInventory()
      Toggles the player's inventory open or closed based on its current state.

    • jGetBuildToolTip

      public static String jGetBuildToolTip(String name, int pos)

      String - name - The name of the window.
      Integer - pos - The position of the resource block (1-based index, starting from 1).
      Returns:
      A String containing the text of the tooltip.

    • jGetBuildResName

      public static String jGetBuildResName(String name, int pos)

      String - name - The name of the window.
      Integer - pos - The position of the resource block (numbering starts from 1).
      Returns:
      A String representing the name of the resource.

    • jGetBuildValues

      public static String jGetBuildValues(String name, int pos)
      Retrieves the values in the specified block of the building window.
      Parameters:
      String - name - The name of the window.
      Integer - pos - The position of the resource block (numbering starts from 1).
      Returns:
      A String in the format a/b/c representing the values.

    • jPlaySound

      public static void jPlaySound(String resname, int delay, int times)

      Parameters:
      String - resname - The name of the resource from the res/sfx folder (e.g., jPlaySound("sfx/chop", 500, 5);).
      Integer - delay - The delay in milliseconds between each sound play.
      Integer - times - The number of times to repeat the sound.

    • jGetObjects

      public static JSGob[] jGetObjects(int rad, Object offset, Object mask)
      Retrieves an array of JSGob objects within the specified radius and offset from the player (in tiles).
      Parameters:
      Integer - rad - The search radius (in tiles).
      jCoord - offset - The offset from the player (in tiles).
      String - [] mask - The enumeration of required object names (substring of resource; "!" at the beginning excludes the object from the search).
      Returns:
      A JSGob[] array of objects.

    • jGetObjectsInRect

      public static JSGob[] jGetObjectsInRect(Object absPos, Object size, int blob, Object mask)
      Retrieves an array of JSGob objects with the specified name, BLOB, and within the specified rectangle.
      Parameters:
      jCoord - absPos - Absolute coordinates of the rectangle's starting point (northwest corner).
      jCoord - size - The size of the rectangle.
      Integer - blob - The BLOB of the object.
      String - [] mask - The enumeration of required object names (substring of resource; "!" at the beginning excludes the object from the search).
      Returns:
      A JSGob[] array of objects.

      A Boolean value. true if the information has changed, otherwise false.

    • jBuddyForgetCurrent

      public static void jBuddyForgetCurrent()
      Forgets the currently selected kin.

    • jShowWarnings

      public static void jShowWarnings(boolean show)
      Toggles the display of warnings for deprecated functions.
      Parameters:
      Boolean - show - false disables the warnings, true enables them.

    • jBuddyList

      public static String[] jBuddyList()
      Retrieves an array of all of the kins from the kin list.
      Returns:
      A String[] array containing the list of kins.

    • jGob

      public static JSGob jGob(int gob)
      Retrieves the JSGob object by its identifier (wrapper for deprecated functions).
      Parameters:
      Integer - gob - The object ID.
      Returns:
      A JSGob representing the object with the specified ID.

    • jHaveParty

      public static boolean jHaveParty()
      Checks if the player is in a party with others.
      Returns:
      A Boolean value. true if the player is in a party, otherwise false.

    • jPartyClick

      public static void jPartyClick(int index, int btn)
      Sends a click to a party portrait.
      Parameters:
      Integer - index - The index of the portrait.
      Integer - btn - The mouse button.

    • jYouAggroedId

      public static boolean jYouAggroedId(int id)
      Checks if the player has aggroed an entity by its ID.
      Parameters:
      Integer - id - The ID of the entity.
      Returns:
      A Boolean value. true if the entity is aggroed, otherwise false.

    • jGetVersion

      public static String jGetVersion()
      Retrieves the client version.
      Returns:
      A String containing the client version.

    • jFindMapObjectNearAbs

      public static JSGob jFindMapObjectNearAbs(Object coord, int radius, String name)
      Finds a map object matching the name near the given absolute coordinates within the specified radius.
      Parameters:
      jCoord - coord - The absolute coordinates.
      Integer - radius - The search radius (in pixels).
      String - name - The name of the object.
      Returns:
      A JSGob object representing the found map object.

    • jLeaveParty

      public static void jLeaveParty()
      Leaves the party if one exists.

    • jAreaSelector

      public static haven.Coord[] jAreaSelector(Object wndpos)
      Prompts the user to select an area on the map with the mouse (like the ruler with [CTRL + L] ). Returns an array of four coordinates: 1 - Absolute coordinates of the top-left corner of the area. 2 - Absolute coordinates of the bottom-right corner of the area. 3 - Offset from the player in tiles (to the top-left corner). 4 - Size of the area in tiles. If canceled, the array contains four null values.
      Parameters:
      jCoord - wndpos - Coordinates of the window's position on the screen.
      Returns:
      A Coord[] array containing the selected area coordinates.

    • jGetFepCurrentList

      public static String[] jGetFepCurrentList()
      Retrieves the current list of FEPs (Food Event Points) in the FEP bar.
      Returns:
      A String[] array containing the FEPs (possible values: "str", "agil", "intel", "cons", "perc", "csm", "dxt", "psy").

    • jGetFepCurrentAmount

      public static double jGetFepCurrentAmount(String fepName)
      Retrieves the value of the specified FEP in the FEP bar.
      Parameters:
      String - fepName - The name of the FEP in the FEP bar (possible values: "str", "agil", "intel", "cons", "perc", "csm", "dxt", "psy").
      Returns:
      A Double value of the specified FEP, or 0 if not found.

    • jGetFepCurrentCap

      public static double jGetFepCurrentCap()
      Retrieves the current cap (maximum value) of the FEP bar (After food).
      Returns:
      A Double value representing the FEP bar cap.

    • jGetFepMaxValue

      public static int jGetFepMaxValue()
      Retrieves the maximum value of the FEP bar (Before any food).
      Returns:
      The maximum FEP value.

    • jGetFepMaxName

      public static String jGetFepMaxName()
      Retrieves the name of the stat with the highest FEP value.
      Returns:
      A String representing the name of the stat with highest FEP value. (possible values: "str", "agil", "intel", "cons", "perc", "csm", "dxt", "psy").

    • jGetStatByName

      public static int jGetStatByName(String name)
      Returns the base value (without buffs) of the specified stat.
      Parameters:
      String - name - The name of the stat. Possible values: FEPs: "str", "agil", "intel", "cons", "perc", "csm", "dxt", "psy" Skills: "unarmed", "melee", "ranged", "explore", "stealth", "sewing", "smithing", "carpentry", "cooking", "farming", "survive" Beliefs: "life", "night", "civil", "nature", "martial", "change" LA: "expmod"
      Returns:
      An Integer representing the current value of the stat, or 0 if not found.
